20101220233811.000|20101220233813.000|CC1|YOUNG AND RESTLY FOR 30 YEARS

20101220233816.000|20101220233818.000|CC1|AND DIDN'T WANT TO TRAVEL FROM  
20101220233818.000|20101220233820.000|CC1|NEW YORK TO L.A.

20101220234853.000|20101220234854.000|CC1|HIS SKIN TO EASILY BLISTER AND  
20101220234854.000|20101220234855.000|CC1|FALL OFF.
